rukus.text: har shaqs ek na ek taraf mutawajje ho raha hai, tum nekiyo ki taraf daudo, jahaa kahi bhi tum hoge, Allah tumhe le ayega, Allah ta’ala har cheez par qaadir hai
aap jahaa se nikle apna mu (namaaz ke liye) masjid haraam ki taraf kar liya kare, yahi haq hai aap ke rab ki taraf se, jo kuch tum kar rahe ho us se Allah ta’ala be qabar nahi

aur jis jagah se aap nikle apna mu masjid haraam ki taraf pherle aur jaha kahi tum ho apne chehre osi taraf kiya karo, ta ke logo ki koi hujjath23 tum par baaqi na reh jaaye, sivaaye un logo ke jinhone un mein se zulm kiya hai, tum un se na daro, mujh hee se daro aur ta ke main apni nemath tum par puri karo aur is liye bhi ke tum raahe rasth pao

jis tarah hum ne tum mein tum hee mein se rasaol bheja jo hamaari aayate tumhaare saamne tilaawath karta hai aur tumhe paak karta hai aur tumhe kitaab wa hikmath aur wo cheeze sikhaata hai jin se tum be ilm thein
is liye tum mera zikr karo, main bhi tumhe yaad karonga, meri shukar guzaari karo aur na-shukri se bacho
